extendedInfo.description: Thereâs deep knowledge nearby â knowledge for life and learning â when you locate and unlock the rich, relevant resources of your public library. Itâs as simple as using Access My Library from Gale, part of Cengage Learning, a world-leading publisher of reference information.When you need credible information for life and learning from thousands of current magazines, journals, encyclopedias and more, itâs all available 24/7.Access My Library uses your global position to locate libraries within a 10-mile radius, then will give you access to online resources.â¢	Health care - discover dependable facts â¢	Environment - track the latest findings â¢	Biographies - from history and todayâs headlinesâ¢	Career choices â step by stepâ¢	Literature â track a bestseller or write a term paperâ¢	Science - Study current, credible researchâ¢	Hundreds of sources for Home, School or BusinessWith AML, your Android phone becomes a valuable research tool. While others tap out trivia answers, youâll dig into the worldâs leading reference data sources.Your search is over. AML takes you right to the source â¦your trusted library.

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: The app itself runs very dodgy and freezes up when trying to start it up, but all this does is direct you to different search pages in your library system.  Unless you want to find your closest library, don\'t bother with the app and just search their webpage.
reviews.author: Nathan Smith

reviews.comment: Wont open for me.  When i touch \"continue\" or \"a different library\" it flashes \"waiting for location fix\" wrhich it never gets, even with GPS enabled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t find libraries
reviews.comment: I work for the public library system and my office is 2 blocks from our library. App says try again when I am within 10 miles of a library. Force closed 6 times in 5 mins.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting there
reviews.comment: Turns out, libraries have to take the initiative to put their branches into the system. Our system did this and it works great.  Android version does have problems. You can\'t bookmark libraries as advertised (you can with iOS  though), you can\'t view all the library info either.  The app is sufficient but but there yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forced a close right off the bat.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to fix map layer
reviews.comment: Library icons show but map background is missing..also many libraries are mapped in completely wrong location/city.  Love quick access to library reso
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful but difficult
reviews.comment: I like the access I can get but there must be a more intuitive way to access the information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Library online
reviews.comment: Nice to have. Will change rating when I can navigate the site app better. So far so good...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps Crashing
reviews.comment: Force closes on startup. Needs some work. I am using an Archos 43
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: So far it\'s crashed on my several times on my Samsung Galaxy SII.  I\'ve had to uninstall and re-install it once.  It says only one library is near me (and I\'m fairly certain that that library doesn\'t exist where it says it does).  I\'ve only had it for about 45 minutes.  Despite that, I have managed to get to search the database.  It\'s slow and not optimal for cellphones.  It uses the same exact webpage it uses for PCs, which makes it slow and clunky on a cell phone.  This app needs a lot of work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Location, location
reviews.comment: Yeah I\'m not leaving location sources on just for the privilege of using this, uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constantly force closes
reviews.comment: Uninstalling, it is useless like this.  I cannot even launch it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: All I get when searching is...
reviews.comment: \"You are not authorized for this product\" HTC Thunderbolt
reviews.author: A Google User
